benchmark_details.name: Environmental large language model Evaluation (ELLE) question-answer (QA) dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The ELLE-QA Benchmark is the first dedicated dataset designed to evaluate large language models and their derivatives in the ecological and environmental sciences, comprising 1,130 QA pairs covering 16 environmental subjects.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a standardized benchmark for evaluating generative AI applications in the ecological and environmental domain.

data.source: Expert questionnaire and open-source authoritative materials
data.annotation: Collected through structured questionnaires and manual curations

methodology.calculation: Scores based on the performance of generating accurate, clear, and practical responses.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance across evaluation dimensions.
methodology.validation: QA pairs were validated through a rigorous cross-screening and expert review process.
